title: The Work prejudice film
creator_credit: Ray Rivas, Allan Frank Sandler and Sandler Institutional Films
brief_description: Investigates the stereotypes surrounding the world of work relevant to an American situation. Documentation and humour are used to motivate the young person who faces 25 to 45 years in the workforce. Narrated by Robert Vaughn. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
